name: It's A Small World And It's Gonna Get Smaller
name_original: It's A Small World And It's Gonna Get Smaller
description:
See how many cows and people you can abduct and gently drop them into the Area 51 Silo but don't get shot down by the police or army!

A - Left D - Right W - Up S - Down Space - Tractor Beam

This was our LDJam38 entry. Any Feedback appreciated.
